org.opends.sdk.util
Class Iterables

java.lang.Object
  org.opends.sdk.util.Iterables

public final class Iterables
extends Object

Utility methods for manipulating Iterables.

Method Detail

empty

public static <M> Iterable<M> empty()
Returns an immutable empty iterable.

Type Parameters:
M - The required type of the empty iterable.
Returns:
An immutable empty iterable.

filter

public static <M,P> Iterable<M> filter(Iterable<M> iterable,
                                       Predicate<? super M,P> predicate,
                                       P p)
Returns a filtered view of iterable containing only those elements which match predicate. The returned iterable's iterator supports element removal via the remove() method subject to any constraints imposed by iterable.

Type Parameters:
M - The type of elements contained in iterable.
P - The type of the additional parameter to the predicate's matches method. Use Void for predicates that do not need an additional parameter.
Parameters:
iterable - The iterable to be filtered.
predicate - The predicate.
p - A predicate specified parameter.
Returns:
A filtered view of iterable containing only those elements which match predicate.

filter

public static <M> Iterable<M> filter(Iterable<M> iterable,
                                     Predicate<? super M,Void> predicate)
Returns a filtered view of iterable containing only those elements which match predicate. The returned iterable's iterator supports element removal via the remove() method subject to any constraints imposed by iterable.

Type Parameters:
M - The type of elements contained in iterable.
Parameters:
iterable - The iterable to be filtered.
predicate - The predicate.
Returns:
A filtered view of iterable containing only those elements which match predicate.

singleton

public static <M> Iterable<M> singleton(M value)
Returns an iterable containing the single element value. The returned iterable's iterator does not support element removal via the remove() method.

Type Parameters:
M - The type of the single element value.
Parameters:
value - The single element.
Returns:
An iterable containing the single element value.

arrayIterable

public static <M> Iterable<M> arrayIterable(M[] a)
Returns an iterable containing the elements of a. The returned iterable's iterator does not support element removal via the remove() method.

Type Parameters:
M - The type of elements contained in a.
Parameters:
a - The array of elements.
Returns:
An iterable containing the elements of a.

transform

public static <M,N,P> Iterable<N> transform(Iterable<M> iterable,
                                            Function<? super M,? extends N,P> function,
                                            P p)
Returns a view of iterable whose values have been mapped to elements of type N using function. The returned iterable's iterator supports element removal via the remove() method subject to any constraints imposed by iterable.

Type Parameters:
M - The type of elements contained in iterable.
N - The type of elements contained in the returned iterable.
P - The type of the additional parameter to the function's apply method. Use Void for functions that do not need an additional parameter.
Parameters:
iterable - The iterable to be transformed.
function - The function.
p - A predicate specified parameter.
Returns:
A view of iterable whose values have been mapped to elements of type N using function.

transform

public static <M,N> Iterable<N> transform(Iterable<M> iterable,
                                          Function<? super M,? extends N,Void> function)
Returns a view of iterable whose values have been mapped to elements of type N using function. The returned iterable's iterator supports element removal via the remove() method subject to any constraints imposed by iterable.

Type Parameters:
M - The type of elements contained in iterable.
N - The type of elements contained in the returned iterable.
Parameters:
iterable - The iterable to be transformed.
function - The function.
Returns:
A view of iterable whose values have been mapped to elements of type N using function.

unmodifiable

public static <M> Iterable<M> unmodifiable(Iterable<M> iterable)
Returns a read-only view of iterable whose iterator does not support element removal via the remove(). Attempts to use the remove() method will result in a UnsupportedOperationException.

Type Parameters:
M - The type of elements contained in iterable.
Parameters:
iterable - The iterable to be made read-only.
Returns:
A read-only view of iterable whose iterator does not support element removal via the remove().
